00022 #ifndef _CHARTMOUSELISTENER_H_
00023 #define _CHARTMOUSELISTENER_H_
00024 
00025 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
00026 
00028 
00033 class CChartMouseListener
00034 {
00035 public:
00037         CChartMouseListener()  { }
00039         virtual ~CChartMouseListener()  { }
00040 
00042         enum MouseEvent
00043         {
00044                 MouseMove,
00045                 LButtonUp,
00046                 LButtonDown,
00047                 LButtonDoubleClick,
00048                 RButtonUp,
00049                 RButtonDown,
00050                 RButtonDoubleClick,
00051         };
00052 
00054 
00060         virtual void OnMouseEventTitle(MouseEvent mouseEvent, CPoint point) { }
00062 
00070         virtual void OnMouseEventAxis(MouseEvent mouseEvent, CPoint point, 
00071                                                                         CChartAxis* pAxisClicked) { }
00073 
00079         virtual void OnMouseEventLegend(MouseEvent mouseEvent, CPoint point) { }
00081 
00087         virtual void OnMouseEventPlotArea(MouseEvent mouseEvent, CPoint point) { }
00089 
00099         virtual void OnMouseEventSeries(MouseEvent mouseEvent, CPoint point,
00100                                         CChartSerie* pSerie, unsigned uPointIndex) { }
00101 };

00103 #endif  // _CHARTMOUSELISTENER_H_
